details api_response = api_instance.get_application_detail(application_id, body=body) pprint(api_response) except ApiException as e: print("Exception when calling ApplicationsApi->get_application_detail: %s\n" % e) ```## Documentation for API EndpointsAll URIs are relative to *http://localhost*Class | Method | HTTP request | Description------------ |
